abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks hitting coach Don Baylor is hospitalized after fainting at Miller Park 90 minutes before the team was scheduled to work out in preparation for their National League division series against Milwaukee Brewers.
snippet: Don Baylor, the Arizona Diamondbacks’ hitting coach, fainted in the lunchroom of the visiting clubhouse at Miller Park.
lead_paragraph: Don Baylor, the Arizona Diamondbacks’ hitting coach, fainted in the lunchroom of the visiting clubhouse at Miller Park.

headline.main: Arizona Coach Baylor Is Hospitalized After Fainting
headline.print_headline: Baylor, an Arizona Coach, Is Hospitalized After Fainting
headline.seo: Baylor, an Arizona Coach, Is Hospitalized After Fainting
